concept.description: Abstract concept that returns all injectables.
Abstract concept that returns all fields and methods that have been labeled with "InjectionPoint", "JEE" and "CDI".
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member:InjectionPoint:JEE:CDI) RETURN member AS InjectionPoint ORDER BY member.name

constraint.description: Bean-Producer-Methoden d√ºrfen nicht direkt aufgerufen werden.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (artifact:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(type:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method), (beanType:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(beanProducer:JEE:BeanProducer), (method)-[invokes:INVOKES]->(beanProducer) WHERE NOT ( artifact:Test OR type:Generated ) RETURN type as Type, invokes as Invocation, beanType as BeanProducerType, beanProducer as BeanProducer

constraint.description: Fields of injectable types must not be manipulated, except from constructors.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (artifact:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(injectable:Type:Injectable:JEE), (injectable)-[:DECLARES]->(field:Field)-[:OF_TYPE]->(fieldType:Type), (injectable)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method), (method)-[writes:WRITES]->(field) WHERE (fieldType)-[:ASSIGNABLE_FROM*0..]->(:Injectable:JEE) AND NOT ( artifact:Test OR injectable:Generated OR method:Constructor // method is a constructor OR method:PostConstruct OR method:PreDestroy OR (field.synthetic IS NOT NULL AND field.synthetic) // synthetic fields, e.g. generated by Groovy ) RETURN injectable as Injectable, writes as WriteToInjectableField, field as Field ORDER BY Injectable.name, Field.name

constraint.description: Fields holding injectables should be declared final.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (artifact:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(type:Type:Injectable:JEE)-[declares:DECLARES]->(field:Field)-[:OF_TYPE]->(injectedType:Type:Injectable:JEE) WHERE NOT ( artifact:Test OR type:Generated OR (field.final IS NOT NULL AND field.final = true) OR (field.synthetic IS NOT NULL AND field.synthetic) // synthetic fields, e.g. generated by Groovy ) RETURN type AS Type, field AS Field ORDER BY Type.name, Field.name

constraint.description: Injectable components must not be accessed from static variables.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (artifact:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(field:Field)-[:OF_TYPE]->(fieldType:Type), (type:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method)-[:WRITES|READS]->(field) WHERE (fieldType)-[:ASSIGNABLE_FROM*0..]->(:Injectable:JEE) AND field.static AND NOT ( artifact:Test OR type:Generated ) RETURN type as Type, method as Method, field as Field

constraint.description: Injectable components must not be held in static variables.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (artifact:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(type:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(field:Field)-[:OF_TYPE]->(fieldType:Type) WHERE (fieldType)-[:ASSIGNABLE_FROM*0..]->(:Injectable:JEE) AND field.static AND NOT ( artifact:Test OR type:Generated ) RETURN type as Type, field as Field ORDER BY Type.name, Field.name

constraint.description: If the constructor of an Injectable is called from another Injectable, then the caller must be a Bean Producer or a private method called from a Bean Producer.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (injectable:Injectable:JEE:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(constructor:Constructor), (artifact:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(type:Injectable:JEE:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method), shortestPath((method)-[:INVOKES*]->(constructor)) WHERE NOT ( artifact:Test OR type:Generated OR method:JEE:BeanProducer OR ( method:Constructor AND (type)-[:EXTENDS*0..]->(injectable) ) OR ( method.visibility = 'private' AND (:JEE:BeanProducer)-[:INVOKES]->(method) ) ) RETURN type as Type, method as Method, injectable as Injectable ORDER BY type.fqn, method.fqn

constraint.description: Injectable classes must not be held as fields in non-injectable classes.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (artifact:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(t:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(f:Field)-[:OF_TYPE]->(fType:Type:JEE:Injectable) WHERE NOT ( artifact:Test or t:Generated or t:JEE:Injectable or f.synthetic IS NOT NULL // exclude synthetic inner class field referencing the outer class ) WITH t, collect(DISTINCT fType.fqn) AS fields OPTIONAL MATCH (t)<-[:EXTENDS|IMPLEMENTS*]-(injectableImpl:Type:JEE:Injectable) WITH t, fields, count(DISTINCT injectableImpl) AS injectableImplCnt WHERE t.abstract IS NULL OR injectableImplCnt = 0 RETURN t AS NonInjectableHavingInjectablesAsField, fields AS Fields

constraint.description: JDK classes must not be injectables. Only exception is java.time.Clock, since the documentation of the named class explicitly recommends using dependency injection.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (type:Type:JEE:Injectable) WHERE type.fqn STARTS WITH "java." AND NOT type.fqn = "java.time.Clock" RETURN type AS Injectable

constraint.description: Since JEE does not provide a configuration stereotype, bean producers must be defined in classes that do not contain any business logic.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (t:Java:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(beanProducer:JEE:BeanProducer), (t)-[:DECLARES]->(otherPublicMethod:Method {visibility: "public"}) WHERE NOT otherPublicMethod:BeanProducer:JEE AND NOT otherPublicMethod:Constructor RETURN DISTINCT t AS `Java-Klasse`

constraint.description: Field injection must be avoided. Constructor injection should be used instead.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (artifact:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(type:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(field:Field:InjectionPoint:JEE)-[:OF_TYPE]->(bean:Java:Type) WHERE NOT ( artifact:Test OR type:Generated ) RETURN type as Type, field as Field
